name: Erron Black
title: The Outlaw Gunslinger
subtitle: A deadly marksman from the Old West who never misses his mark
lore: A mysterious gunslinger whose origins trace back to the American Old West, Erron Black has made a name for himself as one of the deadliest marksmen in any realm. His lightning-fast draws and deadly accuracy with his twin revolvers have earned him both respect and fear from his opponents.

passive.name: Quick Draw
passive.description: Erron Black's first attack on an enemy deals bonus damage equal to [15% of their missing health]. This effect has a cooldown of [12s] per target.

Q.name: Trick Shot
Q.description: Erron Black fires a special bullet that ricochets off walls and terrain. Each bounce increases its damage by [25%]. The bullet deals [80/150/220/290/360] base damage and can bounce up to 3 times.

W.name: Sand Trap
W.description: Erron Black throws a sand bomb that creates a zone lasting [3s]. Enemies in the zone are slowed by [40%] and take [60/120/180/240/300] damage over the duration.

E.name: Roll Out
E.description: Erron Black rolls in the target direction, gaining [50%] movement speed for [1.5s] after the roll. During the roll, he can fire his gun, dealing [70/130/190/250/310] damage to the first enemy hit.

R.name: Dead Eye
R.description: Erron Black takes aim for [1.5s], then fires a powerful shot that deals [300/500/700] damage plus [20% of target's missing health]. If this ability kills an enemy champion, its cooldown is reduced by [50%].

1.name: Steady Aim
1.description: Trick Shot's damage is increased by [15%] for each second Erron Black hasn't taken damage.

1.name: Quick Reload
1.description: Basic attacks reduce ability cooldowns by [0.5s].

1.name: Marksman's Focus
1.description: Gain [10%] bonus Attack Damage when no enemies are within [300] units.

5.name: Enhanced Sand
5.description: Sand Trap now reduces enemy vision range by [30%] while they are in the zone.

5.name: Combat Roll
5.description: Roll Out can store up to [2] charges but has its cooldown increased by [4s].

5.name: Bounty Hunter
5.description: Gain [5%] bonus movement speed when moving toward enemies below [50%] health.

10.name: Perfect Shot
10.description: Dead Eye now ignores [30%] of target's armor.

10.name: Execution
10.description: Dead Eye deals [40%] more damage to targets below [25%] health.

15.name: Ricochet Master
15.description: Trick Shot can now bounce up to [5] times.

15.name: Tactical Advantage
15.description: Gain [20%] attack speed for [3s] after using Roll Out.

15.name: Desert Storm
15.description: Sand Trap now deals [50%] more damage and slows by an additional [20%].

20.name: Gunslinger
20.description: Every third basic attack fires two shots.

20.name: Deadly Focus
20.description: Dead Eye's channel time is reduced to [1s] but cooldown is increased by [20s].

20.name: Outlaw's Revenge
20.description: After taking damage that would reduce HP below [20%], become immune to damage for [1s]. [120s] cooldown.

20.name: Master Marksman
20.description: Passive's cooldown is reduced to [8s] and damage is increased to [20%] of missing health.
